requirements: Course taught through distance learning using videoconferencing technology from Columbia University. Enrollment limited; interested students should e-mail minjin.hashbat@yale.edu for more information.
description:
The structure of the Elementary Finnish course ensures that students receive a solid grounding in both the language and the culture of Finland. The course promotes the development of language ability through the students' participation in communicative activities and discussions.
Course taught through distance learning using videoconferencing technology from Columbia University. Enrollment limited; interested students should e-mail minjin.hashbat@yale.edu for more information.

1.5 Yale College course credits
title: Elementary Finnish I
